item.title: Three killed in hit-and-run accident in Karnataka’s Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru, Feb 28 (IANS) Three youths were killed in a hit-and-run accident in Raichur district of Karnataka, police said on Saturday.
The deceased have been identified as 24-year-old Mohammad Ali, 19-year-old Noor Mohammad, and 26-year-old M. Fayaz, all residents of Sukhani Colony in Raichur city.
The accident occurred when their motorcycle was hit by a truck while they were travelling from Basaveshwara Circle to Chandramouleshwara Circle.
The impact of the collision was so severe that all t...]]>
item.author: Tennews Team

item.title: 4 killed in two accidents in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Raichur: Four people lost their lives in two separate road accidents in the city on Saturday. In an early-morning hit-and-run accident, three youths were killed on the spot. According to police, around 3am, a speeding truck collided with a bike carrying three men near Basaveshwara Circle. The victims are Muhammad Ali Pasha, 24, Noor Muhammad, 19, and Fayaz, 26. They were travelling on Lingasugur Road towards Ganj Circle when the truck hit their bike. Following the accident, the truck driver ...]]>
item.author: Tnn

item.title: 4 youth killed in 2 separate road accidents in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[4 youth killed in 2 separate road accidents in Raichur India Feb 28, 2026
Raichur city saw two heartbreaking road accidents on Saturday, leaving four young people dead.
In the first, a speeding goods container hit a motorcycle near Basaveshwar Circle, killing Mohammad Ali Pasha (24), Noor Mohammad (19), and Fayaz (26)—all from Sukhani Colony.
The second accident involved 21-year-old Basavaraj, who tragically fell from an autorickshaw and was run over by a government bus....]]>
